data.title: Carlos Stanbro Sr. Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Carlos Stanbro Sr., 70, of Newport, North Carolina, passed away on Saturday, March 2, 2024, at his home.Carlos was born on October 15, 1953, in Atlantic City, New Jersey, to the...
data.text:
Carlos Stanbro Sr., 70, of Newport, North Carolina, passed away on Saturday, March 2, 2024, at his home.

Carlos was born on October 15, 1953, in Atlantic City, New Jersey, to the late Jack and Emilly Stambro. He worked faithfully as a Foreman with the Atlantic City Housing Authority before moving to North Carolina.

Those remaining to cherish his memory are his sons, Carlo Stambro Jr., Michael Anthony Strambro, and Jonathan Lee “Jon Boy” Stambro; daughter, Tiffany Marie Stambro; brother, Tony Scull and wife Gayle of Lincoln, NE; nephews, David Stambro and Levant Stambro; and granddaughter, Sarah M. Stambro.

In addition to his parents, Carlos was preceded in death by his brother, Levant Stambro, and nephew, Barry Stambro.

Family and friends are welcome to submit online condolences at www.mundenfuneralhome.net.

Arrangements by Munden Funeral Home & Crematory in Morehead City, NC.
